20110106181517.000|20110106181517.000|CC1|  OR...CHOOSE Aleve AND 2 PILLS 
20110106181517.000|20110106181522.000|CC1|     FOR A DAY FREE OF PAIN.    
20110106181522.000|20110106181525.000|CC1|        ENJOY THE FLIGHT.       
20110106181525.000|20110106181526.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110106181526.000|20110106181526.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110106181526.000|20110106181528.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110106181528.000|20110106181528.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110106181528.000|20110106181532.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110106181532.000|20110106181532.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110106181532.000|20110106181534.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110106181534.000|20110106181536.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110106181536.000|20110106181538.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110106181538.000|20110106181538.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110106181538.000|20110106181540.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110106181540.000|20110106181540.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110106181540.000|20110106181542.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110106181542.000|20110106181542.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110106181542.000|20110106181545.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110106181545.000|20110106181546.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110106181546.000|20110106181546.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110106181546.000|20110106181548.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110106181548.000|20110106181548.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110106181548.000|20110106181551.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110106181551.000|20110106181551.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110106181551.000|20110106181553.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110106181553.000|20110106181553.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110106181553.000|20110106181556.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110106181556.000|20110106181556.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110106181556.000|20110106181558.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110106181558.000|20110106181558.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110106181558.000|20110106181559.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110106181559.000|20110106181601.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110106181601.000|20110106181601.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110106181601.000|20110106181603.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110106181603.000|20110106181603.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110106181603.000|20110106181605.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110106181605.000|20110106181606.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110106181606.000|20110106181606.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110106181606.000|20110106181609.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110106181609.000|20110106181609.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110106181609.000|20110106181611.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110106181611.000|20110106181611.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110106181611.000|20110106181613.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110106181613.000|20110106181614.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110106181614.000|20110106181614.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110106181614.000|20110106181617.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110106181617.000|20110106181617.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110106181617.000|20110106181619.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110106181619.000|20110106181619.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110106181619.000|20110106181621.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110106181621.000|20110106181621.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110106181621.000|20110106181623.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110106181623.000|20110106181623.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110106181623.000|20110106181625.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110106181625.000|20110106181625.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110106181625.000|20110106181628.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110106181628.000|20110106181629.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110106181629.000|20110106181631.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110106181631.000|20110106181631.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110106181631.000|20110106181634.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,

20110106181634.000|20110106181636.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110106181636.000|20110106181636.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110106181636.000|20110106181829.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.

20110106184937.000|20110106184940.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110106184940.000|20110106184942.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110106184942.000|20110106184942.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110106184942.000|20110106184945.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110106184945.000|20110106184945.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110106184945.000|20110106184947.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,

20110106184948.000|20110106184951.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,
